name: granny square beret
notes:
if you're a fan of the granny square, bring that love to your wardrobe with a colorful crochet beret. stitched in our durable red heart super saver o’go, we give you a solid and a multi-version to choose from. this quick and easy project is worked in the round using everyone's favorite, the granny stitch. because it's made with super saver, this chic accessory will keep its gorgeous color, wash after wash.

yarns for model:
red heart™ super saver™ o’go™ (solids: 7 oz/198 g; 364 yds/333 m; prints: 5 oz/141 g; 236 yds/215 m)
version 1 - jeweltone (7195) 1 o’go
version 2 - gold (7160) 1 o’go
